channel.title: Comments on: I’m A Rocket … Man

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/03/22/im-a-rocket-man/#comment-3999">Mac Newbold</a>.
"Wow", and not in a good way :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Mac Newbold.

“Wow”, and not in a good way ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Mac Newbold
item.dc:creator: Mac Newbold
item.description:
You should hear some of the other covers from his album...
http://www.amazon.com/Seeking-Major-Tom-William-Shatner/dp/B005HMUPYW
They're free to play on Turntable.fm if you want the full version.
That version of Rocket Man is a bit better, and his Bohemian Rhapsody might cause injuries. He's also got others, like Spirit in the Sky.
The only word that seems to come close to describing it is "Wow."
item.content:encoded:
You should hear some of the other covers from his album…

http://www.amazon.com/Seeking-Major-Tom-William-Shatner/dp/B005HMUPYW

They’re free to play on Turntable.fm if you want the full version.

That version of Rocket Man is a bit better, and his Bohemian Rhapsody might cause injuries. He’s also got others, like Spirit in the Sky.

The only word that seems to come close to describing it is “Wow.”

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/03/22/im-a-rocket-man/#comment-3997">Chris</a>.
Does make you wonder what they were thinking.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Chris.

Does make you wonder what they were thinking.

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: Bernie was "high as a kite" when he let Shatner cover this song...
item.content:encoded: Bernie was “high as a kite” when he let Shatner cover this song…
